description: Lenart Kova discovers Halden’s hidden datacenter cache. Weighing the consequences, he chooses to leak the sealed Council reports exposing lies about Halden’s death.
Lenart shares selected Council reports and medical logs on secure channels with journalist and activist contacts. Evidence of Council deception about Halden's actions and death spreads rapidly.
Citizen-journalists piece together Halden’s last days, confirming he triggered BCI instability and that the Council covered it up. The story ignites outrage on news platforms and social media.
Mass protests erupt citywide, as citizens demand the Council’s resignation and full disclosure. Calls for new elections, reforms, and protections for whistleblowers spread.
Spontaneous city assemblies form, debating the future of governance. Citizens insist on collective oversight for any new system, while the old Council loses legitimacy.
